activities: The organization uses personal information received from the EU and Switzerland to facilitate the administration of personality assessment tests to individuals in the EU and Switzerland. The organization also receives personal information from individuals in EU and Switzerland with whom it affiliates for purposes related to the personality assessment tests.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data and data regarding affiliates, on-line, off-line, and manually processed.
